website_summaries.verdict: A Food and Drug Administration approved, 3-step cholesterol test that can be conducted within minutes.
pros: In the event you don't have insurance, this is a safe, quality controlled cholesterol test you can start at home
Customers note a high rate of consistency in terms of the lab results and how they compare to their actual doctor's reports
cons: Lab reports are not always consistent in terms of delivery time

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and mailed off my sample. Thirteen days later I receive an email that there are no results as there was an "insufficient sample". I certainly deposited blood as instructed. There was no offer of a refund or retesting. I do not recommend this product, unless you feel inclined to waste $50.
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey

customer_reviews.title: No Insurance? - get this test
customer_reviews.text: Just for fun, I test my blood glucose often. No problem. The hardest part of this test was drawing all the blood required. Drink lots of water beforehand. Expect to be able to drip 4 - 6 large hanging drops from a fingertip. My blood is thick and flows slowly, so I had a harder time - this time. They want you to let the test collection paper dry for 1/2 hour. Mine took 3 hours. I'm guessing this $45.00 test saved me over $200.00 at the doctors office. The results were clear. They educate you as to exactly where you stand. Composite, LDL, HDL, triglycerides, etc. Everything. Very happy with this test kit.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Zander

customer_reviews.title: 5 drops and results in 7 days...quite conveinent
customer_reviews.text: It worked out fine. The kit arrived on time. I took a blood sample (5 drops). Mailed in the sample. Exactly 7 days later i received the results via a pdf in an email. The results seemed consistent with the results from my doctors office. Quite convenient...did not need to drive anywhere or wait in an office.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Slow, slow, slow!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this test because several reviewers said they received results within five days. It has been almost two weeks and two phone calls. Supposedly, the results have been mailed to me. I did go ahead and have a lipid panel completed locally since I wasn't sure when my results would arrive, since they still haven't. Received the results from the local lab that afternoon. Curious, if the home kit results arrive, how close they are to the local lab results. Disappointed in the turn around (especially since the lab is only one state away). The kit was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and read results
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell if this is completely accurate without immediately comparing it to a lab test. But the results came in and were easy to read and I had no problem with the usage of it. I did have to have someone prick my finger cause I could not bring myself to do so, but after that the process was very simple. I would order again and try and do it closer to a lab report to test for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: kmarie83

customer_reviews.title: A good home test!
customer_reviews.text: I used this test to track my blood lipid levels. The blood collection was a bit of a problem. You must get an ample supply of blood in order to get an accurate reading. Otherwise the test results were accurate as compared to blood lipid scores from other labs performed a month earlier. Overall a good home test.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Passante

customer_reviews.title: Never got the results back
customer_reviews.text: Did not get any results back, not going to waste my time calling them to check what happened.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingIsLiving

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the test. While blood collection may take a little long and a few finger pokes if you can't get enough drops, it wasn't that bad. I sent it out and got my results e-mailed to me 8 days later. Easy to read report and coincides with what I've gotten at the doctor's office. Will use again!
customer_reviews.author: Beckiboobear

customer_reviews.title: Accurate as far as I know
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Send in the sample and form. It came back within 3 weeks, which I believe it states on the package. Accurate as far as I know. I will use it again in 6 months to compare.
customer_reviews.author: MMO

customer_reviews.title: Results take FOREVER and the website to get them is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I sent my lab results in 10 days ago and still do not have results. When I log on to the website half the time the website takes you to a blank white page and nothing happens. The rest of the time I get a message that results can take two weeks. So 10 days later I still have no results.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V Fittipaldi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I received the results in a timely manner even though Memorial Day was involved. The results report was very professional and informative. I would certainly use it again and recommend it to anyone needing a cholesterol test. The results jibed with the results I got later at a hospital lab.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were very easy to understand and to perform and the results came ...
customer_reviews.text: This test arrived promptly, the instructions were very easy to understand and to perform and the results came back in a timely manner. The test results were well explained. Accuracy --- can't really say as I don't have a doctor's baseline to compare to. But if you do have that, this is a good, easy test to do at home and compare.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Solana Health Inc. gets an "A"plus!
customer_reviews.text: We are more than happy with the excellent price and results we enjoyed by utilizing the "Best Home Cholesterol Test" kit. At first we were concerned that our results were not returned in 3 days but that was our mistake, not theirs, so when we expressed our concern we quickly got a call from their representative and by that time we found out it can take up to two weeks to receive the full report. Their representative could not have been more concerned and helpful so.... We highly recommend this terrific, convenient, money-saving way to test our cholesterol profiles. Count us in to use this company again! Bonita and Richard Bennett
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second Opinion Confirmed Mine!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this home cholesterol test!! I got it to double check my lipid panel. A new doctor said that my cholesterol was very elevated and that she would have to place me on statins. My lipid panel has always proved very good in the past with high HDL levels. High HDL levels protect the heart. This test confirmed as I thought that my lipid panel is still very good including high HDL levels.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Gave me the results quickly! Instructions were very clear ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave me the results quickly! Instructions were very clear! Take the time to read them over if you never use this before, but very simple to do. Results were email directly to me! Will buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and pleased with the ease of doing the test
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied and pleased with the ease of doing the test. One item seemed to be missing, but we found it (can't recall what it was). Test results came back to us within 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Starry

customer_reviews.title: Easy but the results take a bit of time
customer_reviews.text: The test was easy to use. It took a bit longer than 10 days for the results, but they seem consistent with previous testing. I would recommend thisproduct.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Happy With This Product
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about ordering due to negative reviews. I'm glad I did. The turn around time from date of test and mailing to the results being available was 5 days. The kit was very easy to use. I recommend this kit and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: MugWumps

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Fast results.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other finger stick kits, the lancet in this kit makes you bleed enough to fill the card without the need for a second or third stab. Quick results.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take the sample first thing in the morning ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent off the blood sample and got the results in about 10 days. Easy to take the sample first thing in the morning since you are fasting. Just needs 5 drops from the finger. No vials of blood like at the doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Brodie

customer_reviews.title: easy to read
customer_reviews.text: quick results. within a week. seems accurate. easy to read. comes with 15 omega-3 pills. box says 30 but they just put one packet in.
customer_reviews.author: russ m hagan

customer_reviews.title: Home cholesterol test -Complte Lipid Panel, LDL,HDL, Triglycendes-bu Solano Health
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for at an affordable price, It was very simple and quick, the only hiccup was I didn't get the report within a couple days, but simple solution called them up, they apologized and resent it to my email had it within minutes. I will be buying this one again for myself and my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how good the product is because my sample was not 'usable'
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how good the product is because my sample was not 'usable'. If this happens you are left with nothing to show for your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma C Bush

customer_reviews.title: Planning on buying it again
customer_reviews.text: This test was easy to use and mail. I received my results in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it was exactly like described.
customer_reviews.author: Rivermartin

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for the home lipid panel. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the home lipid panel. I have no idea if the lab I sent my sample off is certified, but they did get my results back to me within two weeks. Hopefully their results were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are easy to follow and everything you need is included in ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the results back quickly though not sure how accurate they are. May retest in 3-4 months for comparison. Instructions are easy to follow and everything you need is included in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: nowhavethreebears

customer_reviews.title: accurate & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this test & taken it twice. The results I received were very close to what I've tested when having blood drawn at a doctor's office so I believe it to be accurate. The product arrived quickly, the instructions are clear & from my experience it was quite easy to use. I received the results quickly both times as well, the second via email (I seem to remember the first being sent via snail mail but it's been a while & I could be wrong). I will definitely be purchasing this product again for regular testing.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Directions were simple and easy to follow. Kit was complete. Hopefully the results will be positive.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Prior

customer_reviews.title: Convenient home test
customer_reviews.text: The readings were generally lower than those from the doctor's office, both total cholesterol, but also HDL and LDL. The test was easy to use and instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well!
customer_reviews.text: The kit came fast, was easy to use, got the results in 3 weeks and the results were accurate and well explained.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lipid Home Test Kit On The Market Today
customer_reviews.text: It is my opinion that this particular Lipid Test from Solano Health is the number one over the counter do it yourself home cholesterol test kit on the market today. If you're looking for the best and most accurate lipid test kit then do yourself a favor and get this one you won't regret it! It will not only make your day but you'll be very pleased with the results. Thanks for taking the time to read this have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ross

customer_reviews.title: The pills make you burp in less than 5 minutes and it does tastes like fish.
customer_reviews.text: The test results came back real quick.The pills make you burp in less than 5 minutes and it does tastes like fish.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Minaya

customer_reviews.title: I am sending the sample to a lab (just like the doctor does) and on the envelope it appears ...
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression I was buying a kit to test my blood for cholesterol at home. Although I received a test "kit", I am sending the sample to a lab (just like the doctor does) and on the envelope it appears that I am agreeing to a lab contract. I am not sure if they will be sending me more test kits (at a cost) automatically. I test my own glucose and cumoudin at home with little machines and thought this was the same....NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: You have to send it out for results. Thought it was an at home test. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: product description did not make clear that this was only ...
customer_reviews.text: product description did not make clear that this was only the test strips for the monitor. I don't have a monitor, so returned the order.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I expected a device for testing your cholestrol at home, not a kit to take your blood and send it off to a lab. I have doctor's for that.
customer_reviews.author: anne-marie

customer_reviews.title: Unable to get results
customer_reviews.text: The kit was delivered on time and kit seemed legitimate. However, the only way to get the results is through a website. The website would not recognize the sample code. There was no phone number, only a contact link. I sent two emails through the contact link and received no response whatsoever. My advise is do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: msmith

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The readings were accurate. The turnaround time was rather lengthy, and the cost I think could be lower. Overall, if you want to save time making a trip to you lab or doctors office, then I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Blue

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than insurance and a doctor visit
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. The instructions are clear, the process is easy, and it is much cheaper than going to the doctor every three months for routine blood tests which can be performed from the comfort of your own home. Not to mention, the savings with a $2000 annual deductible with insurance are an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: pruenpiper

customer_reviews.title: Great test!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clear instructions, results received via mail in 10 business days. Very pleased. Will order again. This beats going to the doctor at 10 am after fasting all night!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Four Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not a home test kit it is a home collection kit.... Okay yes it is a collection kit but it covers postage the cost of the test and you'll have your results in a week to 10 days so I had to give it more stars
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product is simple to use. The product mentions receiving results quickly but it took a few weeks to be notified of the results via email. If you need more immediate cholesterol test results then a doctors office would be best; however, this worked well for me with less hassel and no time and money spent waiting in a doctors office to let someone do what I could do myself. Easy to use once instructions are read and followed.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were well explained and I had no problems ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were well explained and I had no problems with sticking myself and had little pain. They included a large enough bandaid, cloth with alcohol to disinfect, everything that was in the photo. I am anxiously awaiting my results and it has been more than two weeks and I haven't hear anything!
customer_reviews.author: MarcyTheExerciser

customer_reviews.title: Simple, private
customer_reviews.text: Procedure easy. Response I. 1 week as explained in directions.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Brueseke

customer_reviews.title: ... were essentially the same - so the accuracy seems good. I use this to monitor myself between 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I had labs done with this kit and then in my MD's office about 3 weeks apart and they were essentially the same - so the accuracy seems good. I use this to monitor myself between 6 month MD visits and to stay on track with my diet.
customer_reviews.author: LENA

customer_reviews.title: Quick and simple
customer_reviews.text: Quick and simple, makes it easy to keep up with Cholesterol, etc. Received results within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use and ship. Fast, easy to read results. Product looked a little worn/old but it was a great value
customer_reviews.author: J Ro***

customer_reviews.title: Lack of response!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a registered nurse, I followed the instructions as stated and sent the kit to core medical. One week later I was informed the test could not be done and a refund would be issued. I have heard nothing from Solana. I requested another test kit instead of a refund, no response. I am frustrated d/t their lack of response. The premise of this test kit was so promising, we all need to take charge of our own healthcare. I am saddened that this did not work. If I receive another kit and the test produces a valid report, I will updaate my review.
customer_reviews.author: pattyprn

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to create a useable blood sample with the devices supplied to prick my finger, even after using both of them. So it was just money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Furbush

customer_reviews.title: Fast turnaround time
customer_reviews.text: Directions and packaging were concise and clear, everything needed. Results within a week with a very good summary and description, exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: dattaway

customer_reviews.title: save lots of money
customer_reviews.text: Was able to do this quite easily without having to pay exorbitant lab fees. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mlkcrawford

customer_reviews.title: The test instructions were easy to understand and follow
customer_reviews.text: The test instructions were easy to understand and follow, although it was quite hard to get the amount of blood required for the test using the lancets provided. I received my results by email in about 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I compared the results with my lab results from the Dr's office and it's right in line.
customer_reviews.author: Teeballz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fast home mail kit, had results in under a week.
customer_reviews.author: Hindean

customer_reviews.title: After adding my sample and sending it off, package ...
customer_reviews.text: After adding my sample and sending it off, package was returned to me and never made it to the facility to be tested. Not sure what went wrong on this but I'm stuck without any results.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: accurate
customer_reviews.text: I used the meter with the 3 test strips about 1 week after going to Dr for bloodwork...levels were almost exactly the same as the lab results
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A FLOP!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without included "pink" document which is essential so I had to correspond and get substitute ver. emailed. Product was somewhat different then advertisement description. I followed instructions and deposited blood on both designated areas of submittal card and mailed in sealed in provided pkg. but received a letter back saying that my submittal was not good (no details) and canceled my test results with no offer to do again. "A $50 total failure." Everything else from Amazon has always been 4-5 star!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN R OLEARY

customer_reviews.title: Do It at home
customer_reviews.text: I did't plan on sending the product to a lab!
customer_reviews.author: Lester D. Fiegel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS HOME TEST! I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER THIS HOME TEST! I am a diabetic who tests my blood every morning on waking up, and know exactly how to drop blood on a test strip. I dropped two drops on their test strip exactly within the arrow shown. One of the drops (the second one) was a little less than a full drop but still within the parameters specified. The result answer back from the company was ; not suitable for test results! This laboratory is a ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Best Home Cholesterol Test FDA Certified Complete Lipid Panel LDL, HDL and Triglycerides Test Kit
product_meta.description: Lab accurate - as good as your doctor's test without the cost and hassles! All in one home cholesterol test as accurate as your Doctor's test. Just one finger stick and 4-5 drops of blood delivers a full lipid panel test (LDL, HDL, Triglycerides).
feature_bullets: All in One Kit Contains: 1 Blood Collection Card 1 Postage paid sample envelope 2 Finger Stick Devices 1 Gauze Pads 2 Bandages 1 Direction Brochure
